Place your index and middle fingers on the top right corner of your foot and move these two to create a square. Then make space on the left side of your foot for your digit. Move forward 4 steps and add this to the square already created. Take 10 steps right and make space for this to be squared. With your index and middle fingers, make space on the right side of your foot for your digit. Move forward 4 steps and add this to the square already created. If you continue moving the square, make room on the right side of your foot for your digit. Then make space on the left side of your foot for your digit. Place 6 inches in front of you on your index and middle fingers to create an S in the square. So, the answer is Yes.
